mapper.insert: INSERT INTO columns (column_id, title, position, team_id) VALUES (nextval('column_seq'), #{title}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(position), 0) + 1 FROM columns WHERE team_id = #{teamId}), #{teamId})
mapper.select: SELECT column_id, title, position, team_id FROM columns WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY position ASC
